ygData.messageBody:
I must say I agree with Human SK's being th hardest. Not sure why erudite
pally would be harder though?

I have made it up to lvl 43 so it is possible. If I didn't love my class so
much and enjoy it I would have given up long ago.

If you're looking at changes the the SK class to make them more viable I
would suggest a minor life tap spell at lvl 15 or 22 instead of vamp
embrace. the lack of healing is a major pain at low levels. re evaluating
the whole pet idea, and the associated spells (mend bones, voice graft).
some buffing spell would help heaps I think.

and more importantly some nice weapons!! ones that aren't on the plane of
fear 8)

>From: "Brian Hook" <bhook@...>
>
>I spoke with our magic system designer and he does not believe those spells
(Infectious cloud, Spirit Armor, and Augment Death) are
>supposed to be for Shadow Knights and thus might be a data entry error.
He's double checking these.
>
>I'm also talking to him about possibly changing some other aspects of SKs
to make them more viable in the low/mid-levels.
>
>One problem that SKs face -- and one of the reasons that they are so
difficult to play -- is that they were tuned on the assumption
>that you would be playing an Ogre or Troll. As such, human SKs are quite
possibly the second most difficult class/race combination
>in the game to play (after Erudite Paladin).
>
>Brian
